title: Samurai

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On night 1, you must choose two different players to attack.
- At night, you may choose to Pacify a Vengeful Ghost. If they aren't Haunting you tonight, they are Pacified and lose their Haunt charge. (If they are Haunting you, they kill you.)
- At night, you may choose to use Grim Cleave. You gain powerful defense and protect yourself from all attacks dealt by ghosts, pacifying all ghosts who attempt to haunt you. If you use Grim Cleave and no ghosts attempted to haunt you, this ability is disabled permanently. (The ghosts aren't aware it's disabled.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every full moon, you must kill another player.
- You can't attack Peasants, players whose role has been revealed in the system, or players who you've tried to attack previously.
- When you kill players, they become Vengeful Ghosts - they gain one charge of Haunt, dealing an Unstoppable attack to you from beyond the grave.
- You have a list of all Vengeful Ghosts. Once they have used their charge of Haunt, they are marked as Pacified and you are made aware.
- You cannot win until night 3. From night 3 onwards, your victory condition is checked at the start of each morning.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
